Module kivakit.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.thread

Class RepeatingThread

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.broadcasters.Multicaster
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.repeaters.BaseRepeater
com.telenav.kivakit.core.thread.KivaKitThread
com.telenav.kivakit.core.thread.RepeatingThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
Broadcaster, Listener, MessageTransceiver, Repeater, Transceiver, Operation, Pausable, Startable, Stoppable<Duration>, Receiver, Transmitter, Nameable, Named, NamedObject, Runnable
public class RepeatingThread extends KivaKitThread implements Pausable
A thread that repeatedly executes the KivaKitThread.onRun() method implementation at a given Frequency. The thread can be paused and resumed between executions of the user code.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)

  • Method Details

    • run

      public static RepeatingThread run(Listener listener, String name, Frequency every, Runnable code)
      Returns a started thread with the given name that will run the given code at the given frequency. Unlike KivaKitThread.repeat(com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Listener, java.lang.String, com.telenav.kivakit.core.time.Frequency, com.telenav.kivakit.core.code.UncheckedVoidCode), this thread can be paused and resumed.

    • run

      public static RepeatingThread run(Listener listener, String name, Runnable code)
      Returns a started thread with the given name that will run the given code repeatedly. Unlike KivaKitThread.repeat(com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Listener, java.lang.String, com.telenav.kivakit.core.time.Frequency, com.telenav.kivakit.core.code.UncheckedVoidCode), this thread can be paused and resumed.
